# Profound | Optimize Your Brand's Visibility in AI Search

> Profound helps brands win in generative search. Monitor and optimize your brand's visibility in real-time across ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, and other Answer Engines. Drive measurable growth in a zero-click world.

## Home
- [Profound | Optimize Your Brand's Visibility in AI Search](https://www.tryprofound.com/): Profound helps brands win in generative search. Monitor and optimize your brand's visibility in real-time across ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, and other Answer Engines. Drive measurable growth in a zero-click world.

## Blog
- [Blog - AI Search Optimization News and Updates](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog): Stay informed about the latest developments in AI Search Optimization. Read our blog for insights, strategies, and news about improving your brand's visibility in AI-powered search results.
- [Introducing Agent Analytics](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/introducing-agent-analytics): We're excited to announce the launch of Profound Agent Analytics, the world's first platform dedicated to helping you understand exactly how AI crawlers and answer engines interact with your site.
- [Claude Web Search Explained](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/what-is-claude-web-search-explained): On March 20, 2025, Anthropic released Web Search for Claude.ai, transforming it from a static LLM into an Answer Engine just like ChatGPT with Bing, Perplexity, or Google's AI Overviews. However, the critical insight is now clear: Claude leverages Brave Search as its primary search backend, confirmed by a statistically significant overlap of 86.7% (13 out of 15 total results) between Claude's cited results and Brave Browser's top non-sponsored results.
- [Introducing Profound Actions](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/introducing-actions): We're excited to announce the launch of Actions, a powerful new feature that enables you to automate and streamline your AI visibility workflows.
- [X-Forwarded-For for AI Agents](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/x-forwarded-for-ai-agents): On January 23, 2025, OpenAI introduced Operator, a groundbreaking AI system that can control a web browser to perform tasks on behalf of users. This marks a significant evolution in how AI interacts with the web—moving from passive crawling to active browsing. While this advancement brings exciting possibilities, it also presents a fundamental challenge: How can websites understand and serve the actual user behind the AI agent?
- [Introducing Support for Claude](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/introducing-claude-support): We're excited to announce the launch of support for Claude, a major new step in helping businesses understand how their products appear and perform across AI surfaces.
- [Introducing Keyword Hierarchies](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/introducing-keyword-hierarchies): Discover Keyword Hierarchies, a new way to visualize how AI conversations branch into deeper intent,built on real-time search across hundreds of millions of keywords.
- [Introducing Support for Meta AI](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/introducing-meta-ai-support): We're excited to announce the launch of support for Meta AI, a major new step in helping businesses understand how their products appear and perform across AI surfaces.
- [Introducing Support for DeepSeek](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/introducing-deepseek-support): We're excited to announce the launch of support for DeepSeek, a major new step in helping businesses understand how their products appear and perform across AI surfaces.
- [Conversation Explorer Goes Global](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/conversation-explorer-goes-global): Earlier this year, we launched Conversation Explorer in the U.S., giving brands unprecedented visibility into what people are asking in Answer Engines like ChatGPT.
- [Introducing Support for Google AI Mode](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/google-ai-mode-support): We're excited to announce that Profound now supports Google AI mode, marking a significant expansion of our platform's capabilities in tracking AI visibility across Google's evolving search experience.
- [Introducing support for ChatGPT Shopping](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/chatgpt-shopping): We're excited to announce the launch of support for tracking ChatGPT Shopping, a major new step in helping businesses understand how their products appear and perform across AI surfaces.
- [Introducing Support for Grok in Profound](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/introducing-grok-support): We're excited to announce that Profound now supports Grok, marking a significant expansion of our platform's capabilities in tracking AI visibility across xAI's revolutionary search platform.
- [Goodbye blue links, AI Search has arrived](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/ai-search-has-arrived): Google Search was a trillion dollar monopoly for the best part of two decades, until ChatGPT launched in November 2022 and the way people discover information was changed forever.
- [$20M to pioneer Answer Engine Optimization](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/series-a): Profound has raised $20 million in Series A funding, led by Kleiner Perkins, to accelerate our mission of revolutionizing how brands understand and optimize their presence in AI-powered search engines.
- [OpenAI's Operator: AI Agents and Your Brand](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/open-ai-operator): On January 23 2025, OpenAI released Operator, marking a significant evolution in how AI interacts with the web. At Profound, we've conducted an extensive analysis of this new technology, leveraging our expertise in AI system behavior to uncover crucial insights for brands and businesses.
- [Profound Achieves SOC 2 Type 2 Certification](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/soc-2-type-2): Profound has achieved SOC 2 Type 2 certification, demonstrating our continued commitment to maintaining the highest standards of security, confidentiality, and availability for our customers.
- [Agent Experience (AX): The AI-First Manifesto](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/agent-experience-ax-the-ai-first-manifesto): Unlock the power of Agent Experience (AX) with our definitive AI-First Manifesto. Discover why savvy platforms are embracing AI agents (beyond chatbots) to streamline sign-ups, simplify workflows, and capture high-value leads. Stay ahead of the competition with actionable insights and expert strategies for an AI-driven future.
- [How to Choose the Best AI Visibility Provider](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/choosing-ai-visibility-provider): Our framework for choosing the best AI visibility provider to track brand mentions and optimize content for AI answer engines.
- [Expanding our Integrations for Agent Analytics](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/agent-analytics-integrations): We're excited to announce a significant expansion of our Agent Analytics integrations, making it easier than ever for teams to gain visibility into how AI systems interact with their websites.
- [Introducing New Features for Enterprise Brands](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/enterprise-features): We built Profound to simplify the complexity of AI search, giving organizations the tools the need to understand and manage their AI presence.
- [Introducing Templates for AEO Content Creation](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/introducing-actions-templates): Less than two months ago, we launched Profound Actions to help marketers create data-driven content briefs. Since then, some of the biggest brands on the planet have used these briefs to improve their AI visibility in just a few weeks.
- [Introducing On-Demand Keyword Volume Projection](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/conversation-explorer-keyword-volume-projection): At Profound, we launched Conversation Explorer to help brands see exactly what their customers are asking in LLMs like ChatGPT.
- [How AI Answer Engines Will Transform the Future](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/how-ai-answer-engines-will-transform-the-future): AI Answer Engines are driving a platform shift more monumental than social media in 2009, mobile in 2004, or perhaps even the internet itself.
- [Google AI Mode Confirms Chat Is The Future Of Search](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/google-ai-mode): Google is finally admitting that chat is the future of search. Bye-bye blue links, hello AI Mode.
- [Upgrade your Content Library with Content Optimization](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/introducing-content-optimization): Since launching AEO Content Creation, teams have used our templates to create and publish content that consistently earns AI citations.
But most brands don’t just need more content; they need a way to improve the extensive content libraries they’ve already built.
- [Introducing Conversation Explorer Bulk Keyword Analysis](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/conversation-explorer-bulk-analysis): We're thrilled to announce two powerful new tools in Conversation Explorer: Bulk Keyword Analysis and Keyword Research. These tools are built to help you uncover insights from real user prompts across AI platforms like ChatGPT. Understand trends, compare volumes, and export data effortlessly.
- [Introducing Support for Google AI Overviews in Profound](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/google-ai-overviews): We're excited to announce a significant update to the Profound platform: support for analyzing Google AI Overviews is now live for all customers.
- [AI Search Intent Study: What 50M+ ChatGPT Prompts Reveal](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/chatgpt-intent-landmark-study): New research reveals drastically different citation patterns between major AI platforms. Understand how ChatGPT, Google AI, and Perplexity source their information differently and what it means for AI visibility.
- [Announcing General Availability of Conversation Explorer](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/conversation-explorer-general-availability): Today, we're thrilled to announce that Conversation Explorer is now generally available to Profound enterprisecustomers. This milestone represents a significant step forward in helping brands understand and optimize their presence in AI search engines.
- [AI Search Volatility: Why AI Search Results Keep Changing](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/ai-search-volatility): New research reveals 'citation drift' in source selection across major AI platforms, showing how AI citations can change by up to 60% in just one month.
- [Introducing Support for Region-based Prompting and Analysis](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/introducing-regions): ​We are excited to announce the launch of region-based prompting support in Profound's dashboard, a significant enhancement designed to empower multinational and international brands.
- [What We Discovered About AI Crawlers via Server Log Analysis](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/beyond-javascript-ai-crawlers): In December 2024, we conducted a comprehensive analysis of AI crawler behavior by processing millions of server requests across various high-traffic websites. Our findings fundamentally challenge conventional wisdom about web analytics and content optimization for AI systems. Here's our deep dive into the methodology, findings, and implications for web architecture.
- [Close the attribution gap with Google Analytics and Profound](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/google-analytics): Today, we're excited to announce a new integration between Profound and Google Analytics.
- [Profound Agent Analytics is now a One‑Click Vercel Integration](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/agent-analytics-vercel): Today, we're excited to launch the Profound Agent Analytics integration on the Vercel Marketplace — a simple, one-click way to gain powerful insights into how AI systems interact with your site.
- [AEO vs. GEO: Why They're the Same Thing (and Why We Prefer AEO)](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/aeo-vs-geo): Understanding the difference between Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) and Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) and why they're essentially the same strategy.
- [Introducing Profound's Data-Driven Prompt Recommendation Engine](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/data-driven-prompt-recommendation): We combine millions of real user conversations in LLMs to make sure the prompts you track and select are based on what people are actually searching right now.
- [AI Search Shift: ChatGPT's Growing Alignment With Google's Index](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/ai-search-shift): New research reveals ChatGPT's dramatic pivot from Bing to Google search results, fundamentally altering how we need to think about AI visibility and optimization.
- [Tracking DeepSeek R1: First Reasoning Model to Master Web Search](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/deepseek-r1-model-to-master-web-search): In a stunning development that's reshaping the AI landscape, DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup, has recently made waves with their open-source R1 model. Released in January 2025, DeepSeek R1 has garnered attention not just for matching OpenAI's capabilities at a fraction of the cost (90-95% less), but also for being the first to successfully integrate web search into a reasoning-focused language model.
- [Announcing Day 0 Support for GPT-5: Track Your Brand from Launch](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/gpt-5-day-0-tracking-support): OpenAI just announced GPT-5, their smartest and most capable model yet. Profound is ready with immediate tracking support, helping brands understand their AI visibility from day one.
- [Conversation Explorer: The First Tool to Reveal AI Search Volume](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/introducing-conversation-explorer): Profound is excited to unveil a groundbreaking new feature that transforms modern marketing: real-time search volume insights for AI Answer Engines. For the first time ever, marketers can explore how often topics are discussed in platforms like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Copilot - unveiling the blackbox of AI Search.
- [Introducing next‑aeo: Optimize your Next.js App for AI Visibility](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/next-aeo): We're thrilled to announce next‑aeo, a new NPM package from Profound designed for Next.js developers who care not just about SEO, but AEO (AI Engine Optimization). It builds a bridge between your app and today's answer‑driven LLMs.
- [Profound closes $3.5 million seed round to pioneer AI Optimization](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/profound-seed-round): We are proud to partner with Keith Rabois at Khosla Ventures; Max Altman, Ben Braverman, and Thomson Nguyen at Saga Ventures; and the whole team at South Park Commons.
- [Answer Engine Citation Overlap Strategy: How to Win at AI Visibility](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/citation-overlap-strategy): The era of one-size-fits-all content strategy is over. Our analysis of 100,000 distinct prompts run across both ChatGPT and Perplexity revealed a surprising truth: these models are citing fundamentally different corners of the internet.
- [Agents Are Users: Why the Cloudflare-Perplexity Fight Misses the Point](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/agents-are-users-why-the-cloudflare-perplexity-fight-misses-the-point): The recent Cloudflare-Perplexity dispute reveals a fundamental misunderstanding about the future of the web. As AI agents become the primary way users interact with online content, we need to rethink our approach to web infrastructure.
- [Conversation Explorer Expansion: Now with Gemini, Claude, and Perplexity](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/conversation-explorer-expansion): Earlier this year, we launched Conversation Explorer in the U.S. with ChatGPT. Since then, brands have been using it to answer critical questions about their category, brand, and customers.
- [Understanding Grok: A Comprehensive Guide to Grok Websearch, Grok DeepSearch](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/understanding-grok-a-comprehensive-guide-to-grok-websearch-grok-deepsearch): Explore Grok's innovative search mechanisms - Grok Websearch and Grok DeepSearch. Learn how these xAI technologies work together with Profound Agent Analytics to deliver precise, contextually relevant answers.
- [Profound secures $35M to connect brands with one new customer: Superintelligence](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/series-b): The front door of the internet is changing for the first time in 25 years. ChatGPT now reaches over 700 million weekly users, and more than half of consumers begin their research with AI chatbots instead of Google’s blue links.
- [Seeing What Customers See: Direct AI Search Engine Monitoring vs. API Limitations](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/seeing-what-customers-see-direct-ai-search-engine-monitoring-vs-api-limitations): Discover why RAG systems outperform API-only approaches for monitoring AI brand visibility. Learn how real-time retrieval provides deeper insights to protect your digital presence across large language models.
- [AI Platform Citation Patterns: How ChatGPT, Google AI Overviews, and Perplexity Source Information](https://www.tryprofound.com/blog/ai-platform-citation-patterns): New research reveals drastically different citation patterns between major AI platforms. Understand how ChatGPT, Google AI, and Perplexity source their information differently and what it means for AI visibility.

## Guides
- [Guides](https://www.tryprofound.com/guides): Explore in-depth guides on Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) and learn how to optimize your brand's presence in AI-generated responses. Our research-backed guides help you understand and adapt to the future of AI search.
- [How to get your product discovered by ChatGPT](https://www.tryprofound.com/guides/get-your-product-discovered-in-chatgpt-shopping): OpenAI just shared the first clear guidance for how merchants and publishers can get their products included in ChatGPT's new shopping experience. Here's what we know — and how to act on it.
- [OpenAI's Operator and the Dawn of Agent-Oriented SEO](https://www.tryprofound.com/guides/openai-operator-dawn-of-agent-oriented-seo): OpenAI's Operator AI could transform SEO. Optimize sites for humans and AI agents with structured data, clean design, and API strategies. Future-proof your visibility.
- [The 2025 A‑List of Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) Experts](https://www.tryprofound.com/guides/top-experts-in-generative-engine-optimization): The practitioners actually shaping how brands win answers in ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, and Google AI Overviews—plus our data‑driven process for picking them.
- [10-Step Framework for Generative Engine Optimization [2025 Guide]](https://www.tryprofound.com/guides/generative-engine-optimization-geo-guide-2025): A comprehensive 10-step guide to Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) for 2025, including benchmarks, metrics, and actionable strategies for brands to secure AI citations and maximize visibility in LLM-powered search.
- [The Role and Functionality of llms.txt in LLM-Driven Web Interactions](https://www.tryprofound.com/guides/what-is-llms-txt-guide): Discover how llms.txt streamlines web content for LLMs, enabling fast, accurate AI responses and enhanced brand visibility in an AI-first world.
- [The Surprising Gap Between ChatGPT and Google: Why Traditional SEO Isn't Enough](https://www.tryprofound.com/guides/the-surprising-gap-between-chatgpt-and-google): If you think ChatGPT mirrors Google, think again. Profound conducted  research which shows that ChatGPT only overlaps 12% with Google Traditional Search
- [What is Answer Engine Optimization (AEO)? Understanding AEO for the Future of Search](https://www.tryprofound.com/guides/what-is-answer-engine-optimization): Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) is the process of ensuring that a brand, product, or service is accurately represented in AI-generated responses on platforms like ChatGPT, Perplexity, or Google's AI Overviews.
- [How to Improve Your Websites for AI Visibility: Highlights from Our 2,000-Page Research](https://www.tryprofound.com/guides/how-to-optimize-answer-engines-2025): Discover how to enhance your site for Answer Engines like ChatGPT and Gemini in 2025. This comprehensive guide details reliable techniques to increase your presence in AI search and attract more visitors.
- [Winning in AI Visibility: A Marketer's Playbook for Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) in 2025](https://www.tryprofound.com/guides/answer-engine-optimization-aeo-guide-for-marketers-2025): AI answer engines are quickly replacing search as humanity's primary source of truth. Here's how to make sure your brand is ready.

Achieved 11% AI Visibility in Remote Staffing](https://www.tryprofound.com/customers/1840-co-answer-engine-optimization-case-study): Discover how 1840 & Co. leaned into Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) with Profound to achieve 11% AI visibility and become a top 5 brand in remote staffing.

## Features
- [Agent Analytics](https://www.tryprofound.com/features/agent-analytics): Understand how AI crawlers access and interpret your content, optimize for AI-driven search, and unlock new opportunities for visibility.
- [Answer Engine Insights](https://www.tryprofound.com/features/answer-engine-insights): Track your AI visibility, see where and how AI mentions your brand, and uncover insights to enhance your presence.
- [Conversation Explorer - Profound](https://www.tryprofound.com/features/conversation-explorer): Profound's Conversation Explorer is the world's first tool to estimate AI search volume. Improve your brand visibility in AI platforms by targeting and appearing in consumer AI conversations relevant to your brand.

- [Careers at Profound](https://www.tryprofound.com/careers): Join Profound in NYC to revolutionize AI visibility. We're hiring for engineering, data science, and marketing roles to build cutting-edge technology for AI search optimization. Work on AI interpretability, transform digital marketing, and shape the future of brand visibility in AI-powered search results.
- [Digital Marketing and SEO Techniques](https://www.tryprofound.com/careers/aeo-guides): Uncover powerful tactics to boost your site’s exposure, gain more traffic, and expand your digital footprint.
